# Connatix

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="320"
  height="140"
  type="connatix"
  layout="responsive"
  data-connatix='{"data-connatix-token":755145ed-72aa-4a35-bc6e-d5dcfb8837d2}'
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration semantics, contact contact@connatix.com.

### Required parameters

-   `data-connatix`
